home.title: Home
home.subtitle: A passionate developer and tech enthusiast exploring the world of computer science.
home.description1: I'm a third-year computer science student at Epitech, working towards a Master's degree (Bac +5). My passion for technology drives me to explore various IT fields, constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to learn.
home.description2: Currently, I'm focusing on low-level programming, Object-Oriented Programming, web development, and robotics. I'm also eager to expand my knowledge into video game development and graphical programming.
home.description3: I'm actively involved in the 'Coding Club', where we promote IT and development to high school students. Additionally, I serve as a school ambassador, representing Epitech at public events and sharing our passion for technology with future students.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Feel free to reach out to me via email for any inquiries or collaborations.
